channel.title: Sorceress (Neutral Wildcard) + Witch (Black Rose Support)
channel.description:
Name: Sorceress
Night Ability 1: Hex Cast a hex on one player, if that player dies, you are immune to death from all sources(including execution), conversion and poison for that night and the same day Note: If would be executed for treason while immune, day phase ends, but you survive
Passive: Charm of Focus Cannot be occupied
Passive: Malicious Presence The Blue Dragon cannot win while you are alive, additionally if you are alive with a single Blue Dragon member, you win and they do not
Objective: Live to see the Blue Dragon fall
IF CONVERTED BY MASTERMIND:
Name: Witch
Night Ability 1: Put a curse on one player, if they die, you become to immune to death for that night
Night Ability 2: Jinx Jinx one player, if you were to die, they will die instead 1 Use
Passive: Charm of Focus Cannot be occupied
Objective: Standard Black Rose Objective
Lore: IDK
Comments: Inspired by a role from a Forum Mafia site that was tested multiple times

item.title: Sorceress (Neutral Wildcard) + Witch (Black Rose Support)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
I don’t know, to be honest. But as it is you literally cannot die unless you’re hit twice in a row. It’s extremely tank-y, and I feel that there should be some level of skill involved. Maybe move the kill transfer to a one-shot “Hex” night ability (it could probably not be used up unless you’re attacked if you want, also rename the current Hex to Charm). That would change the game from “keep cursing and hope they don’t survive to tell” into "when should I use my Hex instead of my Curse?
